channel.title: Port forwarding
channel.description:
Hi.
I'm new here and would like to get some help for port for fowarding... I'm using A-link BR84. So I go to my "router page" and I click to advanced -> firewall -> port forwarding. it opens a page for port fowarding but im noob and i dont know what to do :P So there is
[img]http://i28.tinypic.com/2uprcls.jpg[/img]
Enable: Name: IP Address: TCP Port: UDP Port:
like that. after enable is a box what you can check and uncheck -> so what do i do? And can I put any name I want on the name place? And after name is a "think" where you can chose the name of your game WTF? so do I just live it blank?
I would like to get help asap cuz my server has been ready for 2 weeks...
P.S how do I add a pic? when I press to the "image adding pottun" it gives me img tags.. so do I first need to upload it to internet? (I mean the pic)
-Thanks reading this :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2008, 10:31:24 PM[/size][hr]any1? :(

item.title: Port forwarding
item.dc:creator: @koppanen koppanen
item.description:
@koppanen wrote:

Hi.

I’m new here and would like to get some help for port for fowarding… I’m using A-link BR84.
So I go to my “router page” and I click to advanced -> firewall -> port forwarding. it opens a page for port fowarding but im noob and i dont know what to do So there is

Enable:
Name:
IP Address:	
TCP Port:	
UDP Port:

like that. after enable is a box what you can check and uncheck -> so what do i do?
And can I put any name I want on the name place?
And after name is a “think” where you can chose the name of your game WTF? so do I just live it blank?

I would like to get help asap cuz my server has been ready for 2 weeks…

P.S how do I add a pic? when I press to the “image adding pottun” it gives me img tags… so do I first need to upload it to internet? (I mean the pic)

-Thanks reading this :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2008, 10:31:24 PM[/size][hr]any1?

Read full topic
